title: Tool Extraction Model
summary: Reusable tools are derived from repeated constraint-driven failure logic.
what_this_is: Defines the permanent rule for converting recurring decision patterns into deterministic tools.
structural_problem: Without extraction, decision logic remains trapped in content and cannot compound into durable utilities.
rule: When identical constraint-driven failure logic recurs across comparisons, it must be formalized as a deterministic tool or gate.
tradeoff: Tool creation is restricted to validated patterns; one-off ideas are excluded.
failure_mode: Tools detach from the corpus, reuse collapses, and compounding stops.
structural_impact: The corpus remains the source of truth; tools are invariant outputs of repeated decision logic.
